programme.title: Complicity
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life incident. Cheng Liang, a Chinese illegal immigrant in Japan finds new direction when he fakes his identity and lands an apprenticeship with a master soba chef. However, the threat of deportation always lurks around the corner.

programme.title: Adela
programme.desc: In this neo-realistic drama, an 80-year-old grandma spends her birthday alone in the slums while waiting for her children to show up. As she reflects on the bygone years of stability, her will to live dignified despite the disappointment of life emerges.

programme.title: Acasa, My Home
programme.desc: For 20 years, the Enache family has been living in the Bucharest Delta in harmony with nature. When the nine children and their parents are evicted from their home, they are forced to adapt to life in the big city.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Kidz
programme.desc: Sara and Nicola are married and in love. Their lives seem to be perfect: they have an angelic six-year-old daughter, thriving careers and a stable marriage. The birth of their second child, which disrupts the family balance, leads to tragicomic scenarios.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: A Summer In Istria
programme.desc: Soccer Scout Anne heads to Istria, Croatia to be the maid of honor at her friend’s wedding. There, a talented 12-year-old player catches her attention, but she has no idea that his father was no other than her childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Complicity
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life incident. Cheng Liang, a Chinese illegal immigrant in Japan finds new direction when he fakes his identity and lands an apprenticeship with a master soba chef. However, the threat of deportation always lurks around the corner.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Kitwana
programme.desc: As a foreigner living in Malaysia, Kitwana is torn between settling down in Malaysia or his home country. Between his mother and his fiancé, he has to make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Aydede (Road To The Moon)
programme.desc: An upset Bekir who had recently lost his grandfather is told by his mother that his beloved grandfather has gone to the moon. While the adults fight over the inheritance, Bekir only dreams of flying to the moon with a bicycle, just like in a movie he saw.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young pre-med Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: Life Feels Good
programme.desc: The true story of Mateusz, a man suffering from cerebral palsy, who in his early childhood had been diagnosed as a retard with no contact with the outside world. After twenty-five years it turned out that he was a perfectly normal and intelligent person.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: Kitwana
programme.desc: As a foreigner living in Malaysia, Kitwana is torn between settling down in Malaysia or his home country. Between his mother and his fiancé, he has to make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Aydede (Road To The Moon)
programme.desc: An upset Bekir who had recently lost his grandfather is told by his mother that his beloved grandfather has gone to the moon. While the adults fight over the inheritance, Bekir only dreams of flying to the moon with a bicycle, just like in a movie he saw.

programme.title: Just Like A Woman
programme.desc: Two women travel from Chicago to Santa Fe to escape their suffocating lives. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a darker secret.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young pre-med Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.

programme.title: Life Feels Good
programme.desc: The true story of Mateusz, a man suffering from cerebral palsy, who in his early childhood had been diagnosed as a retard with no contact with the outside world. After twenty-five years it turned out that he was a perfectly normal and intelligent person.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Summer Rebels (OTO)
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: The Belt
programme.desc: When her friend goes away on a business trip, May’s encounter with her friend’s husband ignites her secret desire for him. She attempts to seduce him in their next meeting, so that she may test his faithfulness.
